#summary How to install this addon in Spring Roo
#labels Phase-Deploy

You can install the addon in Roo 1.1.0 like this (tested with milestones M2, M3):

At first edit conf/config.properties of your Roo installation to add http://spring-roo-equals-roo-addon.googlecode.com/svn/maven-repository/repository.xml as OBR repository there:

{{{
felix.log.level=1
felix.auto.deploy.action=install,start
obr.repository.url=http://spring-roo-repository.springsource.org/repository.xml.zip http://spring-roo-equals-roo-addon.googlecode.com/svn/maven-repository/repository.xml
}}}

Now open a Roo shell and type:

{{{
osgi obr start --bundleSymbolicName de.saxsys.roo.equals.addon
}}}

_ Note: There are currently  some issues with this when using Roo shell within STS (tested with versions up to 2.5.0.M3). For instance, the addon disappears when restarting STS and you have to repeat to command above to install it again._

You can verify that the plugin is active by typing:
{{{
osgi ps
}}}

You should see something like:
{{{
...
[  53] [Active     ] [    1] Spring Roo - Addon - equals() and hashCode() (1.0.0)
}}}

Next step: See [Usage how to use] the equals addon.
